blogs.title: Mapping the Topographic Fingerprints of Humanity Across Earth
blogs.summary: Since geologic time began, Earth's surface has been evolving through natural processes of tectonic uplift, volcanism, erosion, and the movement of sediment. Now a new force of global change is altering Earth's surface and morphology in unprecedented ways:
